Welcome to "Overview of humdrumR"!
This document will give you a very brief overview of what the humdrumR package is, and what it can do. 
If you're all ready to start learning how to use humdrumR, checkout [getting started with humdrumR](GettingStarted.html "Getting started with humdrumR")

#What is humdrumR?

`humdrumR` is is a R package for the visualization, manipulation, and analysis of data encoded in the Humdrum syntax [http://www.humdrum.org].

## What is humdrum?

Humdrum is a system for analyzing blah blah.

```{r setup}
library(humdrumR)
```
